name: learnr
description: moodle-theme_learnr ======================== # LearnR A Moodle 4.0 Boost child theme made for learners. The LearnR theme builds on the new layouts and user experiences introduced in Moodle 4.0. LearnR provides a variety of layouts and options that allow you to provide incredibly structured navigation and pathways to course materials. Continuing the line of evolve-D, Pioneer, and Fordson, the LearnR theme is focused on a student going from “login to learning” quickly and easily.
author: Tina John
